wxPGProperty Flags


Defines

#define wxPG_PROP_AGGREGATE   0x0400
#define wxPG_PROP_CATEGORY   0x2000
#define wxPG_PROP_CHILDREN_ARE_COPIES   0x0800
#define wxPG_PROP_CLASS_SPECIFIC_1   0x0040
#define wxPG_PROP_CLASS_SPECIFIC_2   0x0080
#define wxPG_PROP_COLLAPSED   0x0020
#define wxPG_PROP_CUSTOMIMAGE   0x0008
#define wxPG_PROP_DENY_COMMON_VALUES   0x0100
#define wxPG_PROP_DISABLED   0x0002
#define wxPG_PROP_HIDDEN   0x0004
#define wxPG_PROP_MAX   wxPG_PROP_MISC_PARENT
#define wxPG_PROP_MISC_PARENT   0x4000
#define wxPG_PROP_MODIFIED   0x0001
#define wxPG_PROP_NOEDITOR   0x0010
#define wxPG_PROP_PROPERTY   0x1000
#define wxPG_PROP_READONLY   0x8000
#define wxPG_PROP_WAS_MODIFIED   0x0200

Define Documentation

#define wxPG_PROP_AGGREGATE   0x0400
 

If set, then child properties (if any) should be "invisible" to the application.

#define wxPG_PROP_CATEGORY   0x2000
 

Classifies this item as a category.

Used for faster item type identification.

#define wxPG_PROP_CHILDREN_ARE_COPIES   0x0800
 

If set, then child properties (if any) are copies and should not be deleted in dtor.

#define wxPG_PROP_CLASS_SPECIFIC_1   0x0040
 

Indicates the bit useable by derived properties.

#define wxPG_PROP_CLASS_SPECIFIC_2   0x0080
 

Indicates the bit useable by derived properties.

#define wxPG_PROP_COLLAPSED   0x0020
 

Property has its children collapsed.

#define wxPG_PROP_CUSTOMIMAGE   0x0008
 

This property has custom paint image just in front of its value.

If property only draws custom images into a popup list, then this flag should not be set.

#define wxPG_PROP_DENY_COMMON_VALUES   0x0100
 

A common value cannot be selected by user.

#define wxPG_PROP_DISABLED   0x0002
 

Disables ('greyed' text and editor does not activate) property.

#define wxPG_PROP_HIDDEN   0x0004
 

Hider button will hide this property.

#define wxPG_PROP_MAX   wxPG_PROP_MISC_PARENT
 

Topmost flag.

#define wxPG_PROP_MISC_PARENT   0x4000
 

Classifies this item as a property that has children, but is not aggregate (ie.

children are not private).

#define wxPG_PROP_MODIFIED   0x0001
 

Indicates bold font.

#define wxPG_PROP_NOEDITOR   0x0010
 

Do not create text based editor for this property (but button-triggered dialog and choice are ok).

#define wxPG_PROP_PROPERTY   0x1000
 

Classifies this item as a non-category.

Used for faster item type identification.

#define wxPG_PROP_READONLY   0x8000
 

Property is read-only.

Editor is still created.

#define wxPG_PROP_WAS_MODIFIED   0x0200
 

Switched via SetWasModified().

Temporary flag - only used when setting/changing property value.

Generated on Thu Oct 11 17:25:27 2007 for wxPropertyGrid by 1.3.6
